Hero.title: How is it to be a Web Dev, good?
Hero.about: In my opinion, it's not that it's good or bad. If I had to say what I value most in life, I would say websites.

ComparisonTable.title: Compare Plans
ComparisonTable.subtitle: Choose the plan that best suits your needs

cards.title: Revenue maximization without guessing
cards.content: Price Recommender analyzes market and historical data to automatically recommend prices that maximize profit and occupancy

cards.title: Intelligent AI algorithms that work for you 24/7
cards.content: Our system learns from thousands of data points – taking into account trends, seasonality and the specifics of your property to precisely match prices.

cards.title: Advanced occupancy forecasting
cards.content: Price Recommender not only suggests optimal prices but also provides you with statistics and two reports that will help you boost your pricing strategy even more - Occupancy Forecast and Stay Heat Map.

cards.title: The final word always belongs to you
cards.content: You can trust the recommendations or adjust prices manually – you have complete freedom in decision making. The system won't change any price without your consent. You can also set a minimum/maximum price range.

cards.title: Ease of use
cards.content: You don't need to be a revenue management expert – proposals and justifications are served on a platter, and you manage everything in one convenient window.

cards.title: Modern rate plan management
cards.content: The built-in rate plan module allows for quick and flexible pricing through simple-to-use formulas and inheritance.

features.text: Save time by creating rate plans that automatically inherit prices and settings from another rate plan. All with just a few clicks.
Speed up the input of pricing periods using the convenient season creator and bulk price setting function.
Expand rate plans with advanced pricing formulas and personalization. We put in your hands a solution many times more modern than the rate plan module known from the KWHotel Pro computer program.
Change the price in any system and watch how all rate plans are automatically recalculated in KWHotel Pro, KWHotel Cloud PMS or channel manager system.
Rate plans that you configure in Price Recommender can be immediately used in solutions such as KWHotel Cloud PMS, Cloud Channel Manager or GuestSage's AI Booking Engine.

questions.title: Wie funktioniert Price Recommender?
questions.content: Price Recommender analysiert Marktdaten, historische Trends und Konkurrenz, um automatisch optimale Preise zu empfehlen. Das System lernt aus Tausenden von Datenpunkten und berücksichtigt Saisonalität, lokale Ereignisse und die Besonderheiten Ihrer Immobilie.

questions.title: Kann ich die empfohlenen Preise kontrollieren?
questions.content: Ja, Sie haben die volle Kontrolle! Sie können Empfehlungen mit einem Klick genehmigen oder Preise manuell anpassen. Das System ändert keinen Preis ohne Ihre Zustimmung. Sie können auch einen minimalen und maximalen Preisbereich festlegen.

questions.title: Welche Daten analysiert das System?
questions.content: Das System analysiert Nachfragedaten, Preiswettbewerb, historische Trends, Saisonalität, lokale Ereignisse, Wettervorhersagen und viele andere Faktoren, die die Übernachtungspreise an Ihrem Standort beeinflussen.

questions.title: Benötige ich Kenntnisse im Revenue Management?
questions.content: Nein! Price Recommender ist so konzipiert, dass er einfach zu bedienen ist. Vorschläge und Begründungen werden auf dem Silbertablett serviert, und Sie verwalten alles in einem praktischen Fenster. Sie müssen kein Preisexperte sein.

questions.title: Wie oft erhalte ich Empfehlungen?
questions.content: Sie erhalten täglich Preisempfehlungen für Zimmer und Apartments. Das System reagiert automatisch auf plötzliche Marktveränderungen und liefert aktuelle Vorschläge, die Sie genehmigen oder nach Ihren Wünschen anpassen können.

ForWhom.title: Who is this training for?
ForWhom.subtitle: For Hoteliers and Revenue Managers who want to make faster, more accurate pricing decisions and more easily manage pricing plans in hotel software, portals and booking engines.
ForWhom.description: During the training you will explore knowledge in the following topics:

cards.title: Competition Analysis
items: Monitoring of competitor prices and occupancy and occupancy in your area or city
Parity reports: comparison of own prices vs. OTA.
Position ranking, ratings, insight into weather forecast in pricing decisions.
Using competitor data in pricing recommendations.

cards.title: Practical Price Management
items: Inheritance of prices and restrictions between plans and rooms.
Packages (e.g. with breakfast, services, stays) with minimum/maximum stay.
Price overrides, personal formulas and prices for additional/fewer people.
Sending increased prices to booking portals without creating new plans.

cards.title: Analytics and Reports
items: Revenue, bookings, ADR, average length of stay, "Business on the books".
Sales funnel of the engine (searches → bookings) and share of direct bookings.
Lead time and period comparisons for planning promotions and prices.
Discussion and training on report analysis on our demo accounts.
